amendment.description: Amendment sought to prevent further evaluation or adoption of proposed project alternatives that do not adequately address risks associated with flooding, wildfire, and climate change.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 114-261 to prevent further evaluation or adoption of an alternative that does not adequately address risks associated with flooding, wildfire, and climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 228 (Roll no. 508).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 228 (Roll no. 508).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
